snippet: The company said that the two former executives “revolutionized the worldwide wireless industry with the introduction of the BlackBerry and forever changed how the world communicates.”
abstract: BlackBerry maker Research in Motion says it gave former co-chief executive Jim Salsillie about $8 million after he stepped down; also gave $4 million to former co-chief Mike Lazaridis, who is staying with the firm as vice chairman.
lead_paragraph: The company said that the two former executives “revolutionized the worldwide wireless industry with the introduction of the BlackBerry and forever changed how the world communicates.”

headline.main: Research in Motion Reveals Multimillion-Dollar Pay for Former Chief Executives
